_header: Of Mantua am I beget and born
_description: Gavin Douglas, ‘Mantua me gemit’ — three couplets

CamTCC1184.Transcription:
Of mantua am I beget and borrnIn calabre decessit and forlornNow
                    stant I grave in Naplys þe CiteÞat in my tyme wrait notabill
                    warkes threOf pasturage and eik of husbandryAnd douchty chiftanys full
                    of chevalry
CamTCC1184.Note:
Translates couplet above it, ‘Mantua me gemit: ‘Calabri
                        rapuere tenet me / Parthenope scriui Pastua rura
                    duces’.
